this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->
Seems like changing the version number and then re-registering the package creating a new PR instead of updating this one: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/27792.

Is this a bug @DilumAluthge @staticfloat? I followed the instructions from JuliaRegistrator (https://github.com/tlnagy/TiffImages.jl/commit/1f6b34a6880d9347ee7fd053946ad9a4aa301721#commitcomment-45785063) to update my version number.
